scripts.test: cd ./client && npm run test && cd .. && cd ./server && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.test-watch: npm run test-watch --prefix ./client && npm run test-watch --prefix ./server
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage --prefix ./client && npm run coverage --prefix ./server
scripts.ci:build: concurrently "npm run ci:build --prefix client" "npm run build --prefix server"
scripts.db:restore: docker exec -i db psql -U rs_master -d rs_school < ./setup/backup-local.sql
